title: [The Story of the Kelly gang] (AFC)
brief_description: Fragments of Australia’s first feature film which ran for over an hour. It was possibly the world’s first feature. Includes two sequences which might have been outtakes. One is a confrontation between Ned Kelly and a police constable, and the other a shootout between the gang and the police.
